content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
drop table [ML].[loans_test]
CREATE TABLE [ML].[loans_test]
( 
	LoanID [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CustomerID [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CurrentLoanAmount [real]  NULL,
	Term [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CreditScore [real] NULL,
	AnnualIncome [real] NULL,
	Yearsincurrentjob [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	HomeOwnership [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	Purpose [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	MonthlyDebt [real] NULL,
	YearsofCreditHistory [real] NULL,
	Monthssincelastdelinquent [real] NULL,
	NumberofOpenAccounts [real] NULL,
	NumberofCreditProblems [real] NULL,
	CurrentCreditBalance [real] NULL,
	MaximumOpenCredit [real] NULL,
	Bankruptcies [real] NULL,
	TaxLiens [real] NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
